testcase.name: Should not crash with a blank config
Should not fail with nonexistent delimiters
Should parse meta characters and special characters
Should return the same results if settings are returned back to normal
should have an input of 140 chars exactly
should return exactly an array of size 1

testcase.name: Should count each newline as a character
should trim spaces and concatenated it to one tweet if it can fit
